channel.title: Looking for 667 matrix code that reads a whole string
channel.description:
i have this
[code=java]player.text2 = cmd[1].substring(cmd[1].indexOf(" ") + 1);[/code]
but it only works for the next word after the command i need somthing that will work for the sentence
